Ukraine

The Global Compact in Ukraine was launched on 25 April 2006. Thirty-four leading Ukrainian and multinational companies and organizations signed the Compact at a public event attended by the Minister of Foreign Affairs Mr. Borys Tarasyuk and the Minister of Labour and Social Policy Mr. Ivan Sakhan. The event was attended by 100 other senior representatives of the Ukrainian government, private sector, academia, civil society organizations, donor community, labour unions and mass media.
